name: fireshare
description: Fireshare is a self-hosted video sharing and thumbnailing platform that auto-generates preview GIFs for faster browsing. Ideal for sharing short clips or highlights internally with minimal setup and media privacy.
features: Video Sharing: Self-hosted video platform, Auto-generated preview GIFs, Fast browsing. Private video hosting.
Thumbnailing: Automatic preview generation. Quick content discovery.
Media Privacy: Keep videos private. No third-party hosting.
Minimal Setup: Easy deployment. Quick start.
Video Player: Built-in streaming. Smooth playback.
Organization: Folders and categories. Structured library.
Sharing: Generate share links. Easy distribution.
Responsive: Works on all devices. Mobile-friendly.
